short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspired by one of the biggest toy fads of the late 90s and the early 2000s. A critter to keep you company while at your desk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspired by one of the biggest toy fads of the late 90s and the early 2000s. Here is a chrome critter to keep you company while at your desk. This is a small chrome critter that needs fed and played with on a timely manner. Keep it alive as long as you can!
